skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.actions.IncreaseProduction
skill.description: For an agent to enact the decision of increasing temporary the production of a resource node. While this action is activated, the production of the resource node will be increased with the specified quantity of resource. Once the action is no longer triggered, production returns back to initial production capability.

parameter.name: resourceNode
parameter.description: The resource node to act on.

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quantity of resource that will be added to the node production.

feedback.name: produceActionRunning
feedback.description: Sent once simulation action is running (production of resource is inscreased with specified quantity).
